name: lustfulness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a strong feeling of sexual desire: The song had a powerful lustfulness to it. Lustfulness had led him to pursue a young Ph.D. student.
a strong feeling that you want something: As a nation, our lustfulness for wealth has grown.
More examplesFewer examplesIt seems we're living in society that turns a blind eye to daily lustfulness.He'd always rather prided himself on his capacity for lustfulness.We were shocked by her lustfulness for money and power.He has a consuming lustfulness for all the latest technology.
